attributes.action: Keep Sure Start Hunts Cross Open
attributes.additional_details: Sure Start Childrens Centre in Hunts Cross, Liverpool provides an invaluable service to children and parents from all backrounds in the local area. It's proposed closure would deal a devistating blow to those who use it's services and throw many dedicated and skilled childrens workers into unemployment. We ask the Government to reconsider the decision to close, not only this centre, but all Sure Start Centres.
